GisIRingAbstract Class Reference

#include <IRingAbstract.h>

Inherits GisIDisposable.

Inheritance diagram for GisIRingAbstract:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisIRingAbstract class is a ring Geometry helper type (abstract). GisIRingAbstract is the most general ring type. It is similar to CurveAbstract, but is always closed.
